== Main Inclusion Report for elementary ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/e/elementary/]]</nowiki>; available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Build dependency of netbook-launcher-efl required by the Mobile/ARM team.
** <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Specs/Mobile2DLauncher|Lucid Blueprint]]</nowiki>
 0. ''Security:''
** <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=elementary|CVE entries]]</nowiki>: none
** <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=elementary|Secunia history]]</nowiki>: none
** Ubuntu CVE's: none
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid, no daemons
** No known source code review
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Always works out of the box without configuration
** Lintian reports 7 warnings.
** No debconf questions
** <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:elementary|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>: No bugs. Blocking on build dependencies.
** <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/e/elementary.html|Maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki> is vigorous
** <nowiki>[[http://trac.enlightenment.org/e/wiki/Elementary|Upstream]]</nowiki> is vigorous
 0. ''UI standards:''
** No user visible strings
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy 3.8.2]]</nowiki> compliant
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** ecore : <nowiki>[[MainInclusionReportEcore|MIR]]</nowiki>
** edje : <nowiki>[[MainInclusionReportEdje|MIR]]</nowiki>
** evas : <nowiki>[[MainInclusionReportEvas|MIR]]</nowiki>
 0. ''Maintenance:''
** Minimal maintenance needed
** Debian responsible for bugs
 0. ''Background information:''
** This package is a dependency of netbook-launcher-efl which is to be packaged by the mobile team as part of an effort to bring the netbook experience to non-3d accelerated architectures on ARM.
